name: Uproot (itch) (o0Zephiron0o)
description:
Play as a small angry flying tree and uproots all the other trees!

The game is an endless 2d arcade-style game. 

You play the game by using only arrow keys. (and mouse to access menus and Esc to pause)

Your character will teleport around the 9 grids according to the inputted directions. Attack the enemies by ramming into them. When defeating the big guys you'll enter the "bonus time". Rapidly pressing up and down will give earn you more points. 

Try to stay alive as long as possible!
